articles.title: Rohit Sharma beats MS Dhoni; Virat Kohli, Ab de Villiers, Jasprit Bumrah win big in special IPL awards - Times Now
articles.description: In a special award ceremony to mark 15 years of the Indian Premier League (IPL), the likes of Rohit Sharma, Jasprit Bumrah, and Virat Kohli were some of the big winners. MS Dhoni missed out on the prize despite leading the Chennai Super Kings (CSK) to the tit…
articles.content: Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Ab de Villiers, and Jasprit Bumrah won awards to celebrate IPL's 15-year anniversary |Courtesy-BCCI/IPL
